snippet: Martha Nelson, a former editor in chief of Time Inc., will join Yahoo as its global editor in chief, overseeing its portfolio of digital magazines.
abstract: Former Time Inc editor in chief Martha Nelson will join Yahoo as global editor in chief.
lead_paragraph: Martha Nelson, a former editor in chief of Time Inc., will join Yahoo as its global editor in chief, overseeing its portfolio of digital magazines.

headline.main: Former Editor of Time Inc. to Lead Yahoo Magazines
headline.print_headline: Former Editor of Time Inc. to Lead Yahoo Magazines
